subject: Tennis
Coaches and Managers
Women and Girls
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: When Andy Murray hired Amelie Mauresmo as his coach this summer, he broke the stereotype that top men can’t be coached by women, and he said his choice wasn’t about gender, but about finding a good fit.
snippet: When Andy Murray hired Amelie Mauresmo as his coach this summer, he broke the stereotype that top men can’t be coached by women, and he said his choice wasn’t about gender, but about finding a good fit.
